update.description:
Language updates.
Upgrade acpid to 2.0.23, apache to 2.2.29, bash to 4.3.33, bind to 9.10.1-P1, cairo to 1.14.0, db to 6.1.19, dhcpcd to 6.6.7, ethtool to 3.16, fontconfig to 2.11.1, freetype to 2.5.5, gawk to 4.1.1, grep to 2.21, harfbuzz to 0.9.37, hdparm to 9.45, iproute2 to 3.18.0, iw to 3.17, krb5 to 1.12.2, libpcap to 1.6.2, libpng to 1.6.16, libxml2 to 2.9.2, lsof to 4.88, ntp to 4.2.8, openssl to 1.0.1k, openvpn to 2.3.6, openldap to 2.4.40, pango to 1.36.8, pciutils to 3.3.0, pcre to 8.36, pixman to 0.32.6, procps to 3.3.10, rrdtool to 1.4.9, smartmontools to 6.3, sqlite to 3.8.7.2, squid to 3.4.11, squid-langpack to 20141030, tar to 1.28, tcpdump to 4.6.2, traceroute to 2.0.21, usb-modeswitch to 2.2.0, usb-modeswitch-data to 20140529, util-linux to 2.25.2, vnstat to 1.12, wget to 1.16.1. Upgrade Perl modules DBD-SQLite to 1.46, DBI to 1.633, IO-Socket-SSL to 2.008, Net-SSLeay to 1.66, URI to 1.65, XML-Parser to 2.43.
